content: As Val, the moment of passion with Odyl when she had me tied up was intense and unexpected. It was a moment of vulnerability and trust between us, and it showed me just how deep our connection was. Even though it was a part of a scheme, I could feel the passion and desire radiating from her. And although we didn't act on those feelings at the time, it planted a seed in both of us that eventually led to us exploring our passion for each other years later.
